message: My first Convore group! Too bad I'm on an Android phone and will undoubtedly miss all the fun :(
@Stuporman aw, here's the android app: https://convore.com/convorsation/
here it is in the store: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.netzpfade.convorsation
anyone know if there are still any door tickets left?
We should get one of those soccer balls down from the roof and have a pickup game on the lunch break.
@tritchey come on over. Sit in the bleachers. Pretty sure you won't be turned away.
@noahwesley not sure when the pivot will take place... it will be a new site (and API) though. The API will probably be very similar to Convore's.
@leah When is the pivot coming to convore? Any breaky changes to the API?
